title: Datech ShopSync
description: Datech ShopSync is the ultimate eCommerce integration solution that seamlessly connects Shopify to TikTok Shop. Our innovative TikTok Shop connector ensures that your products, categories, orders, and inventory are always synchronized in real-time, maintaining consistency and accuracy across platforms. Any updates you make to your Shopify store (adding or removing products) are instantly reflected in TikTok Shop, such as titles, descriptions, prices, SKUs, images, and more.
